DOC.brief_summary: The hypothesis was that education of rehabilitation officers who were responsible for rehabilitation back to work for sick-listed individuals in screening for mental disorders and psychiatric topics would increase the rate of return to work and reduce the number of sicklisted days
DOC.brief_title: Application of Psychiatric Knowledge in the Rehabilitation Process in Return to Work.
DOC.criteria: sicklisted and belonging to the caseload of rehabilitation officers who participated in the intervention
